Posts.Content: I have not, but my onc says she has many patients that have good results on Verzenio after progression on iBrance.
Posts.Title: Switching to Verzenio after Ibrance

Posts.Content: I dropped to 50 mg after a horrible time at 15. The 50 mg dose kept my disease stable for many months. I’m trying 100mg now because I’ve had some suspicious spots in my brain at my last few MRIs and wanted to see if I could tolerate that dose and maybe increase efficacy in the brain.
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose
